subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Luke Donald is the third player this year, after Lee Westwood (twice) and Martin Kaymer, to be ranked No. 1 since Tiger Woods relinquished the spot to Westwood in November 2010.
snippet: Luke Donald is the third player this year, after Lee Westwood (twice) and Martin Kaymer, to be ranked No. 1 since Tiger Woods relinquished the spot to Westwood in November 2010.
